Question: What are the names of the processes that depend on an application, which in turn depends on a software version that is running on a machine located in data center 'DC-East'?
Cypher:
MATCH (data_center:DataCenter {name: "DC-East"})-[:CONTAINS]->(machine:Machine)-[:RUNS]->(software:Software)-[:VERSION]->(version:Version),
      (machine)<-[:RUNS]-(app:Application)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(software),
      (process:Process)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(app)
RETURN data_center, machine, software, version, app, process, process.name
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (data_center:DataCenter {name: "DC-East"})-[relation6:CONTAINS]->(machine:Machine)-[relation7:RUNS]->(software:Software)-[relation8:VERSION]->(version:Version),
      (machine)<-[relation9:RUNS]-(app:Application)-[relation10:DEPENDS_ON]->(software),
      (process:Process)-[relation11:DEPENDS_ON]->(app)
RETURN relation11, relation10, relation9, relation8, relation7, relation6, data_center, machine, software, version, app, process, process.name
Semantic-EQL-Question: Which processes depend on applications that utilize specific software and versions within machines housed by the "DC-East" data center, and how are these applications linked to their respective software?

Question: Retrieve the IP addresses of interfaces connected to routers found in data centers with a location attribute of 'Central Region' that also depend on a specific service named 'Firewall'.
Cypher:
MATCH (data_center:DataCenter {location: "Central Region"})-[:CONTAINS]->(router:Router),
      (router)-[:ROUTES]->(interface:Interface),
      (interface)-[:CONNECTS]->(router),
      (service:Service {name: "Firewall"})<-[:DEPENDS_ON]-(router)
RETURN data_center, router, interface, service, interface.ip
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (data_center:DataCenter {location: "Central Region"})-[relation4:CONTAINS]->(router:Router),
      (router)-[relation5:ROUTES]->(interface:Interface),
      (interface)-[relation6:CONNECTS]->(router),
      (service:Service {name: "Firewall"})<-[relation7:DEPENDS_ON]-(router)
RETURN relation7, relation6, relation5, relation4, data_center, router, interface, service, interface.ip

Question: Which data centers contain routers that run an operating system older than version 3.5 and are linked to a network with an IP '192.168.1.1'?
Cypher:
MATCH (data_center:DataCenter)-[contains_router:CONTAINS]->(router:Router)-[runs_os:RUNS]->(os:OS)-[os_version:VERSION]->(version:Version),
      (network:Network {ip:"192.168.1.1"}), (router)-[connects_interface:ROUTES]->(interface:Interface)-[connects_network:CONNECTS]->(network)
WHERE version.name < "3.5"
RETURN data_center, contains_router, router, runs_os, os, os_version, version, network, connects_interface, connects_network
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (data_center:DataCenter)-[contains_router:CONTAINS]->(router:Router)-[runs_os:RUNS]->(os:OS)-[os_version:VERSION]->(version:Version),
      (network:Network {ip:"192.168.1.1"}), (router)-[connects_interface:ROUTES]->(interface:Interface)-[connects_network:CONNECTS]->(network)
WHERE version.name < "3.5"
RETURN interface, data_center, contains_router, router, runs_os, os, os_version, version, network, connects_interface, connects_network

Question: Identify the types of machines in racks located within data centers named 'DataHub42' that contain switches with IP '10.1.2.3'.
Cypher:
MATCH (data_center:DataCenter)-[contains_rack:CONTAINS]->(rack:Rack)-[holds_switch:HOLDS]->(switch:Switch {ip:"10.1.2.3"}), (rack)-[holds_machine:HOLDS]->(machine:Machine)-[machine_type:TYPE]->(type:Type)
WHERE data_center.name="DataHub42"
RETURN data_center, contains_rack, rack, holds_switch, switch, holds_machine, machine, machine_type, type, type.name
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (datacenter:DataCenter {name: "DataHub42"})-[:CONTAINS]->(rack:Rack)-[:HOLDS]->(switch:Switch {ip: "10.1.2.3"}), (rack)-[:HOLDS]->(machine:Machine)-[:TYPE]->(machine_type:Type)
RETURN relation5, datacenter, rack, switch, machine, machine_type, machine_type.name
Rewrite: Determine the variety of machinery housed in the racks of 'DataHub42' data centers that possess switches with the IP address '10.1.2.3'.

Question: List the names of all software that depend on other software which in turn are dependent on applications running on OS named 'Linux' within the same machine.
Cypher:
MATCH (os:OS {name:"Linux"})-[:RUNS]->(machine:Machine)-[:RUNS]->(app:Application)
MATCH (dependent_software:Software)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(app)
MATCH (software:Software)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependent_software)
RETURN os, machine, app, dependent_software, software, software.name
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (os:OS {name:"Linux"})-[relation5:RUNS]-(machine:Machine)-[relation6:RUNS]->(app:Application)
MATCH (dependent_software:Software)-[relation7:DEPENDS_ON]->(app)
MATCH (software:Software)-[relation8:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependent_software)
RETURN relation8, relation7, relation6, relation5, os, machine, app, dependent_software, software, software.name
Rewrite: Enumerate all software that relies on other software, which is in turn reliant on applications operating on a Linux-based OS within the same device.

Question: Can you provide the name and start time of all applications that run on machines where the OS is 'Windows 10' and also have a dependency on the version '1.0'?
Cypher:
MATCH (machine:Machine)-[runs_machine_os:RUNS]->(os:OS {name:"Windows 10"}), 
      (machine)-[runs_machine_app:RUNS]->(app:Application)-[app_version_instance:INSTANCE]->(version:Version {name:"1.0"})
RETURN machine, runs_machine_os, os, runs_machine_app, app, app_version_instance, version, app.name, app.startTime
Rewrite: Could you list all applications, along with their start times, that operate on systems using 'Windows 10' and depend on version '1.0'?

Question: What are the relations between processes that depend on services which are instances of applications that communicate through ports labeled '8080'?
Cypher:
MATCH (process:Process)-[process_depends_on_service:DEPENDS_ON]->(service:Service)-[service_instance_of_application:INSTANCE]->(application:Application)-[application_listens_port:LISTENS]->(port:Port {port:8080})
RETURN process, process_depends_on_service, service, service_instance_of_application, application, application_listens_port, port
Rewrite: What is the relationship between processes reliant on services that are derivatives of applications communicating via ports marked '8080'?

Question: Detail the chain of dependencies involving software and its versions routed through services up to applications for the software named 'DatabaseManager'.
Cypher:
MATCH 
  (software:Software {name: "DatabaseManager"})-[software_version:VERSION]->(version:Version),
  (software)-[software_service:DEPENDS_ON]->(service:Service),
  (service)-[service_application:DEPENDS_ON]->(application:Application)
RETURN 
  software, software_version, version, software_service, service, service_application, application
Rewrite: Outline the dependency chain from software and its versions through services to applications for the software called 'DatabaseManager'.

Question: Which interfaces connect to zones and route traffic to networks that encompass machines running services with at least 5 dependencies?
Cypher:
MATCH (interface:Interface)-[connects:CONNECTS]->(zone:Zone),
      (interface)-[routes:ROUTES]->(network:Network),
      (machine:Machine)-[:RUNS]->(service:Service)
WHERE size(service.dependencies) >= 5
RETURN interface, connects, zone, routes, network, machine, service
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (interface:Interface)-[connects:CONNECTS]->(zone:Zone),
      (interface)-[routes:ROUTES]-(network:Network),
      (machine:Machine)-[relation7:RUNS]->(service:Service)
WHERE size(service.dependencies) >= 5
RETURN relation7, interface, connects, zone, routes, network, machine, service
Rewrite: What interfaces link to zones and direct traffic toward networks containing machines operating services that have a minimum of five dependencies?

Question: Examine the relation path from data centers containing racks, to machines held within them, that are associated with types having an ID greater than 1000.
Cypher:
MATCH (dataCenter:DataCenter)-[containsRack:CONTAINS]->(rack:Rack)-[holdsMachine:HOLDS]->(machine:Machine)-[machineType:TYPE]->(type:Type)
WHERE type.id > 1000
RETURN dataCenter, containsRack, rack, holdsMachine, machine, machineType, type
Rewrite: Investigate the connection route from data centers equipped with racks to the machines contained therein, which are linked to types with IDs exceeding 1000.

Question: Identify the dependency connections starting from a version named '3.2', through any software relying on it, up to the processes they run.
Cypher:
MATCH (version:Version {name:"3.2"})<-[version_rel:VERSION]-(software:Software)-[software_dep:DEPENDS_ON]->(process:Process)
RETURN version, version_rel, software, software_dep, process
Rewrite: Trace the dependency links beginning with the version labeled '3.2', through all dependent software, to the processes they operate.

Question: Trace the dependents of the application 'CloudSync', including intermediate software and services, up to the process level with specific roles.
Cypher:
MATCH (application:Application {name: "CloudSync"})
OPTIONAL MATCH (application)-[app_depends_service:DEPENDS_ON]->(service:Service)
OPTIONAL MATCH (service)-[service_depends_software:DEPENDS_ON]->(software:Software)
OPTIONAL MATCH (service)-[service_depends_process:DEPENDS_ON]->(process_service:Process)
OPTIONAL MATCH (software)-[software_depends_process:DEPENDS_ON]->(process_software:Process)
OPTIONAL MATCH (application)-[app_depends_process:DEPENDS_ON]->(process_application:Process)
RETURN application, app_depends_service, service, service_depends_software, software, service_depends_process, process_service, software_depends_process, process_software, app_depends_process, process_application
Rewrite: Map out the dependencies of the 'CloudSync' application, covering all related software and services down to the process level, specifying their roles.

Question: How many distinct software depend on at least two different versions and have applications listening on port '9999'?
Cypher:
MATCH (software:Software)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(version:Version)
WITH software, COUNT(DISTINCT version) AS versionsCount
WHERE versionsCount >= 2
MATCH (software)-[:INSTANCE]->(application:Application)-[appListen:LISTENS]->(port:Port)
WHERE port.port = 9999
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT software)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (software:Software)-[relation4:DEPENDS_ON]->(version:Version)
WITH software, COUNT(DISTINCT version) AS versionsCount
WHERE versionsCount >= 2
MATCH (software)-[relation5:INSTANCE]-(application:Application)-[appListen:LISTENS]->(port:Port)
WHERE port.port = 9999
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT software)
Rewrite: How many unique software rely on at least two distinct versions and possess applications that listen on port '9999'?

Question: What is the average number of ports listened by services that are instances of software deployed on machines which are in racks located in the data center named 'WestCoastHub'?
Count the number of machines running more than three different types of OS, which include an application depending on a service named 'LoadBalancer'.
Cypher:
MATCH (machine:Machine)-[runs_os:RUNS]->(os:OS)
WITH machine, COUNT(DISTINCT os) AS osCount
WHERE osCount > 3
MATCH (machine)-[:RUNS]->(app:Application)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(service:Service)
WHERE service.name = 'LoadBalancer'
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT machine)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (machine:Machine)-[runs_os:RUNS]->(os:OS)
WITH machine, COUNT(DISTINCT os) AS osCount
WHERE osCount > 3
MATCH (machine)-[relation5:RUNS]->(app:Application)-[relation6:DEPENDS_ON]->(service:Service)
WHERE service.name = 'LoadBalancer'
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT machine)
Rewrite: Tally the machines operating over three distinct OS types that run an application reliant on a service called 'LoadBalancer'.

Question: Calculate the minimum RAM size in Types of machines that are managed under racks within the 'Central Valley Data Center' and run applications named 'AnalyticsApp'.
Cypher:
MATCH (dataCenter:DataCenter {name: "Central Valley Data Center"})-[:CONTAINS]->(rack:Rack)-[:HOLDS]->(machine:Machine)-[:TYPE]->(type:Type),
      (machine)-[:RUNS]->(application:Application {name: "AnalyticsApp"})
RETURN MIN(type.ram) AS MinimumRAMSize
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (dataCenter:DataCenter {name: "Central Valley Data Center"})-[relation5:CONTAINS]->(rack:Rack)-[relation6:HOLDS]->(machine:Machine)-[relation7:TYPE]->(type:Type),
      (machine)-[relation8:RUNS]->(application:Application {name: "AnalyticsApp"})
RETURN MIN(type.ram) AS MinimumRAMSize
Rewrite: Determine the smallest RAM size for machines managed in racks at the 'Central Valley Data Center' that operate the 'AnalyticsApp'.

Question: What is the maximum size of the network zones that are connected via interfaces to switches in data centers located in 'Northern Sector'?
Cypher:
MATCH (dataCenter:DataCenter)-[:CONTAINS]->(switch:Switch)-[:ROUTES]->(interface:Interface)-[:CONNECTS]->(zone:Zone)
WHERE dataCenter.location = 'Northern Sector'
RETURN MAX(zone.size)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (dataCenter:DataCenter)-[relation4:CONTAINS]->(switch:Switch)-[relation5:ROUTES]->(interface:Interface)-[relation6:CONNECTS]->(zone:Zone)
WHERE dataCenter.location = 'Northern Sector'
RETURN MAX(zone.size)

Question: Calculate the sum of the CPU resources for all machines that run a process depending on a service which, in turn, depends on a version named 'Beta'.
Cypher:
MATCH (machine:Machine)-[:RUNS]->(process:Process)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(service:Service)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(version:Version)
WHERE version.name = 'Beta'
MATCH (machine)-[:TYPE]->(type:Type)
RETURN SUM(type.cpu) AS TotalCPUSum
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (machine:Machine)-[relation5:RUNS]->(process:Process)-[relation6:DEPENDS_ON]->(service:Service)-[relation7:DEPENDS_ON]->(version:Version)
WHERE version.name = 'Beta'
MATCH (machine)-[relation8:TYPE]->(type:Type)
RETURN SUM(type.cpu) AS TotalCPUSum
Rewrite: Determine the total CPU resources used by all machines operating a process that relies on a service dependent on a version titled 'Beta'.
